name: Clinical NER Annotation
description: Named entity recognition layout for clinical text annotation
author: Glyph Team

entityTypes.label: Measurement
entityTypes.description: Lab values, vital signs, and measurements

guidelines: Select the entire entity span including modifiers
Do not include punctuation at the end of entities
Mark dosages as part of the medication entity
Use the most specific entity type available
When in doubt, refer to the annotation guidelines document
